pda.base
Class PdaSimu

java.lang.Object
  pda.base.PdaSimu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, IPda
public class PdaSimu
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPda, java.awt.event.ActionListener

The base class of PDA simulator. This class displays the PDA emulator and manage all the applications

Version:
$Revision: 27 $
Author:
F. Merciol, D. Deveaux <{francois.merciol|daniel.deveaux}@univ-ubs.fr>
